description.value:
You interact to sheathe your blade and enter Iai Stance, channeling the elemental power of the ocean through your blade. Until the end of your turn, your next @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-adventures-in-etheirys.feats.Item.8jgzEcxG5mynZZQz]{Tenka Goken} will have the following additional effect:

The area affected by Tenka Goken increases to a 30-foot cone in the direction of your slash, and the precision damage of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-adventures-in-etheirys.actions.Item.D6a4phlAxmixy2lo]{Hakaze} is added to tenka goken's damage as water damage, even if the creature succeeds (but doesn't critically succeed) the save. Creatures who critically fail this save also fall @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}. All damage dealt by tenka goken becomes water damage.
